pos review: Great flats in the centre of town, superbly styled and comfortable.

Apartment is spacious, lovely, and perfectly located. There is a well equipped kitchen, which our host equipped with coffee, tea, and a bottle of wine. Balcony with table great in warm weather. Highly recommended.
neg review: There is a small elevator, helpful for luggage, but large suitcases don't fit so these need to be carried up steep stairs.

pos review: Everything was on point! It was a perfect weekend.
A beautifully appointed, spacious and comfortable appartment in the city centre. We thoroughly enjoyed or weekend in Ghent.
Beautiful spacious apartment  near center of old city
Clean, spacious and very well equipped.
neg review: For someone who stays for longer periods for work like myself, access to a washing machine would be nice. But everything else made up for this.

pos review: We loved our stay in Hof Van Spanje. The rooms were stylishly decorated, spotlessly clean and very comfortable. The kitchen was well equipped and well set out and we liked having different seating areas, at the dining table and in the sofa area. We could not have asked for more.
neg review: The apartment was almost perfect, the only small issue being the sensor operated hall light. This seemed very sensitive and we worked out in the end that it was triggered by people walking across the floor of the apartment above. We assume that it is mandatory to have a sensor operated light in Ghent, but if this could be adjusted that would be an improvement. But this was a small detail.
